## `prefer while`

### `0`

```

  ✖ A while loop should be used over a for loop

  > 1 │ for (; x.running;) {
  > 2 │   x.step();
  > 3 │ }

  ℹ Recommended fix

      │ - for (;·x.running;) {
    1 │ + while (x.running) {
    2 │     x.step();
```

### `0: formatted`

```
while (x.running) {
  x.step();
}
```
